topic.title: Crypto Currency
topic.body: Hi there, I think about getting 1 or 2 bitcoins. Never did that before. Anyone familiar with that?

1_17LQPJZz9sBC1besM5ZwKFKt9CmndJTjcA.body: How can I *not* host anti-semitic crap on my ZeroNet computer? Can I block this somehow?

1_13EUVTHXUNK46bs3QXB8AtJ6sxPXcSQh31.body: Thanks guys, I am watching bitcoin videos on youtube to understand it better. TED ist great :-)
